attributes.title: I FEEL VIOLATED

attributes.title: Just don't download it

attributes.title: it killed my grandma
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app and the first thing it did when i opened it was shut down my phone, a few short seconds later it explodes in my hands. i originally gave the app 2 stars because of this but the next day i went to visit my grandma and she was dead on the floor ! i checked the security tapes and it turns out trump came to my grandmas apartment and killed her because i gave the app a low rating, how crazy. anyway 1 star because the app was kinda slow too.
